article.paragraph: You can download the Network Distro as an application, that you can run locally on your own computer. No internet connection is required, in order to run this software. In order to use the program, download the version corresponding to your type of computer.

Currently, the executables are not signed. Therefore, Windows creates a warning, when the software is started. Click on Run anyway or on More info and than on Run anyway, in order to start the program on Windows.
